extendedInfo.description: TEMPLE RUN: BRAVE IS AN OFFICIAL APP WITH AN ALL NEW LOOK AND ARCHERY FEATURES!From Imangi, the makers of Temple Run, and Disney comes a new take on the most exhilarating app. Join Merida from Disney/Pixar Brave as you run, slide, jump, turn and shoot your way across the wilds of Scotland on an endless running adventure!New features just for Temple Run: Brave --â¢ Introducing ARCHERY â tap targets to shoot a bullseye and earn extra coinsâ¢ New, amazing visuals.  It looks better than ever!â¢ All new environments inspired by Disney/Pixar Brave and the wilds of Scotlandâ¢ Play as Merida from Disney/Pixar Braveâ¢ Outrun Mordu, the demon bear, to earn running gloryBonus: Download Temple Run: Brave and start running with $.99 worth of coins for FREE, thatâs 2500 coins for power-ups and more!---------------------------------Also includes all the great features from Temple Run:â¢ Simple swipe and tilt control that are easy to use and just feel rightâ¢ Level up your character and use crazy power-upsâ¢ Endless play!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This game is sweet.  Love temple run, and loving this game so flippin much fun. Any and all temple runs are high quality games. Nothing tops them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what problem people have with this game but it runs great and does not hang., atleast on the note 2.graphics are good. But for a paid app they need to add more features like oz. More characters and more scenarios. Hope they add all this in future versions. On the whole oz us better
reviews.author: Anurag Gunderia

reviews.title: Awesome cool fergus
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Arianna Paige

reviews.title: Fun game but...
reviews.comment: Very fun game to play but a lot of the time it won\'t open have to re install often
reviews.author: Jessica McAlexander

reviews.title: Poor draw distance
reviews.comment: Foggy as with on screen info getting in the way.Obviously not optimised for Galaxy S4.
reviews.author: Peter Stapleton

reviews.title: A great game
reviews.comment: I love this game but it could through in a little different stuff every once in a while
reviews.author: Macey Hutchison

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Me my 4 yr old ans 9 year old love this game
reviews.author: Nikita Harding

reviews.title: Never Actually Been Able to Play
reviews.comment: I payed 65p for this game. I love Temple Run games and was disappointed when I tried to play it and it would not turn on. I tried it around 15 times to no avail. I can\'t get the refund process to work either. So basically I paid good money to get 35mb of my storage taken up with a loadof rubbish! Great!
reviews.author: isla Kendall

reviews.title: Brill on a Sony # and galaxy note
reviews.comment: This has been my son\'s fave game since we downloaded it. Plays really well.
reviews.author: Anita Marbrow

reviews.title: It won\'t work for me!!!
reviews.comment: I bought it to play BUT it won\'t let me open it. It keeps telling me there is an error opening game. This makin mad!!!
reviews.author: TraLynn Thompson

reviews.title: Our favorite!
reviews.comment: Probably our most favorite out of all the temple runs.... Because you play as a girl. Gurls rule!  ;-)
reviews.author: mtdawgy

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Everytime i get to my highscore it randomly shows blue screen and says i died
reviews.author: Jack Cooper

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: The game appreaed to run smoothly at first, but after playing for only a few minutes i became really aggrevated. It appears that when i jump or turn a corner i die. Yes that is right, i die. There does not have to be a pit, a log, or water but i die. This seems to be a major bug issue, and i wanted to report it since i do content moderation for web sites for a living. I would love to continue to play this game because i enjoy the templel run series. This could easily be the best in the series if this proble
reviews.author: Nathaniel Ward

reviews.title: wish there was a 4.5 star!
reviews.comment: Very good and addictive game. Visuals are superb. Graphics are superb. Two small issues. Tiny bits of lag visible at times. And controls feel a tad unresponsive. But just whack sensitivity up to Max and the problem and the problem is mostly sorted. An update should fix the lag issue. Well worth buying. Tip: Buy a powerful device e.g dual/quad core.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Laggy
reviews.comment: I love this game and bought this app cuz its the only one available for my phone and its laggy as hell and I just die randomly PLZ FIX!! Cuz this is a great game and would def give it 5 stars if it wouldn\'t lag!! And now it wont even open! And says force close! Wth!!! and cant even get a refund. Plz plz plzzzz fix!!! And also I would give it 5 stars.if u would update it with a fix for the glitches!!! Either that or give me a refund! B.S!!
reviews.author: Chris Stamphe

reviews.title: Galaxy N8000
reviews.comment: Excellent Graphics could have more extras like OZ Run. Hopefully there\'s more updates to come.
reviews.author: Bernie deHair

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: This is the only version that I paid for and I cNt even play it.  Hangs up.
reviews.author: Melissa Jacobs

reviews.title: Faulty with achieved coins
reviews.comment: I would love to rate this five but a problem that I have came across is when I visit the store I don\'t have all of my coins,  only the ones that I have just won in my most recent game.  This means I keep losing my money and I can never buy anything.  Change it!  Hopefully it will be improved as I am now updating it.
reviews.author: katie shirley

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Runs smoothly in my phone. For me, this is the best in the Temple Run series.
reviews.author: Renante Perez

reviews.title: It loads but won\'t open when
reviews.comment: I tried to play it only loaded then closes but not force close
reviews.author: ahsaad constantine
